channel.title: Flash Notifications
channel.description: TechNotes, security bulletins, and product update announcements for the Macromedia Flash Player.

item.title: MPSB05-04 ? Potential Security Risk with Macromedia eLicensing Client Activation Code
item.description: (Security Bulletin): Windows versions of the Macromedia installers and eLicensing client install a service with permissions that allow any member of the "Users" group to modify the service settings. This may allow local users to obtain the permissions ...
item.dc:subject: Security Bulletin

item.title: Lip Syncing in Flash
item.description: (Developer Center) Learn to perfectly sync animation to dialog with this Macrochat by Chris Georgenes.
